com.cognifide.qa.bb.frame

Class FrameSwitcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.qa.bb.frame.FrameSwitcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WebDriverClosedListener

    public class FrameSwitcher
extends Object
implements WebDriverClosedListener

    This class is the core of Bobcat's frame switching feature. It stores information about current frame and all previously visited frames.

    FrameSwitcher is thread-local, which means that each thread will use its own instance of this class.

    FrameSwitcher is a WebDriverClosedListener. It resets the frame stack automatically when the webdriver is closed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FrameSwitcher

        public FrameSwitcher()
        Default constructor. It should not be used directly by the user. FrameSwitcher instances will be created by Guice.

    • Method Detail

      • switchTo

        public void switchTo(FramePath framePath)

        Use this method to manually switch to the frame you need.

        The target frame will be put on the frame stack, so that all subsequent frame-aware calls will be performed within it.

        Remember to call switchBack when you no longer need to operate within your manually defined frame.

        Parameters:
        framePath - FrameSwitcher will switch to the frame defined by this FramePath.

      • switchBack

        public void switchBack()

        Takes the top frame off the stack and switches to the previous frame.

        Currently Bobcat doesn't check that there is any frame to switch back to or that you have manually switched before this method was called. Double check your manual switching to avoid weird side effects.

      • switchTo

        public void switchTo(String path)

        Use this method to manually switch to the frame you need.

        This frame will be put on the stack, so all subsequent frame-aware calls will be performed within it.

        Remember to call switchBack when you no longer need to operate within your manually defined frame.

        Parameters:
        path - Frame path provided as String. Bobcat will first parse it into FramePath object before it performs switching.

      • onWebDriverClosed

        public void onWebDriverClosed(boolean terminated)
        This method is automatically called by the webDriver. It should not be called manually by the user. It resets the stack frame when the web driver is closed.
        Specified by:
        onWebDriverClosed in interface WebDriverClosedListener
        Parameters:
        terminated - indicates if the browser was actually terminated.

      • putFramePathOnStack

        public void putFramePathOnStack(int index)
        Puts the IndexedFrame descriptor on the frame stack, without performing switching. TargetLocator uses this method when Bobcat user does switching using webDriver directly. Don't call this method manually.
        Parameters:
        index - of the frame

      • putFramePathOnStack

        public void putFramePathOnStack(String nameOrId)
        Puts the NamedFrame descriptor on the frame stack, without performing switching. TargetLocator uses this method when Bobcat user does switching using webDriver directly. Don't call this method manually.
        Parameters:
        nameOrId - name of the frame

      • putDefaultFramePathOnStack

        public void putDefaultFramePathOnStack()
        Puts the DefaultFrame descriptor on the frame stack, without performing switching. TargetLocator uses this method when Bobcat user does switching using webDriver directly. Don't call this method manually.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resetting the stack frame means clearing it and putting there the default frame

      • getCurrentFramePath

        public String getCurrentFramePath()
        Returns:
        path of the current frame
